a.n: Teen Titans Go! Night Begins To Shine 2 VI

p.k: The Night Begins to Shine 2: Chapter One – Mission to Find the Lost Stems / The Night Begins to Shine 2: Chapter Two – Drums / The Night Begins to Shine 2: Chapter Three – Guitar / The Night Begins to Shine 2: Chapter Four – Bass / The Night Begins to Shine 2: Chapter Five – You're the One The elderly Titans decide to take one last trip to the world of Night Begins to Shine only to encounter a new villian ruling the land, Ultralak. / In order to stop Ultralak, the Titans must find three music stems, but will need help from a local Miner to get the first stem away from the Sheriff. / The Titans are horrified to learn that songs are being melted down and polluting the landscape. / To retrieve the final stem, the Titans must concur a virtual world full of increasingly harder obstacles. / The Titans use to the stems to summon BER, but will it be enough to stop Ultralak?
